timeline.message: Wait for intermediate page to load completely in @PreserveOnRefresh IT (#8327)

Store vaadin hash to node_modules (#8282)

To notice outside changes to package.json
better we add the hash to node_modules
so we can cross check the value.

Fixes #8182

# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/TaskRunNpmInstall.java

Cherry pick from 2.1 to 2.2 (#8342)

* Push browser history state after navigation is certain
fixes parts of #3619
Update chrome version to 83 (#8417)

Do not use compatibility mode production frontend prefixes without compat mode (#8465)

Fixes #8292

Fix issue with Push unsubscribe URL. (#8330)

Related to #8177

Workaround a bug in the external reflection library. (#8431)

Fixes #8371

Force pnpm version >=4.4.0, <4.6.0 (#8452)

Fixes #8434

Force chokidar version to ^3.4.0 (#8432) (#8451)

Fixes #8432

Removing deprecated parameter from DataNode constructor (#8325)

If you use container (such as the latest Wilfdly) which forces to use significantly newer version of Jsoup than Vaadin depends to, this can cause a problem as deprecated method as been removed.
Fix Javadoc typo in NavigationTargetFilter (#8467)

Close UI after refreshing the page in PreserveOnRefresh case and mark it
(#8365)

Fixes #8286

* IE compatible version of JS
